spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved. However, window placements in the master bedroom and bedroom 2 deviate from the plan (rendered as smaller punched openings rather than large architectural glass units). The entrance door area shows slight scale distortion.

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural integrity is mostly maintained, but the utility area adjacent to the kitchen is merged into a vague room structure. Several closets indicated in the 2D plan are missing or rendered as open voids.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen counters and dining table are correctly placed. Living room sofa orientation is slightly altered from the plan. Bathroom fixtures are largely missing or simplified.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering with clean lighting and consistent materials. Geometry is sharp and professional with good contrast.

detected_errors.description: Missing utility wall separation from the kitchen area.
Windows in peripheral bedrooms do not match the architectural span indicated in the 2D floor plan.
Wall thickness appears inconsistent between internal partitions and external load-bearing walls.
Living room furniture grouping is rotated relative to the wall placement shown in the floor plan.
